column1: #Text=It's stuff like this that propels Donald Trump (and let's face it, Rob Ford) into power.
#Text=People are tired of being called sexist just because (an extremely flawed) woman doesn't win.
#Text=They're tired of being called racist, xenophobic, transphobic and Islamophobic at every turn to justify progressive outcomes that 'ought to have been'.Donald Trump won fair and square.
#Text=You may not like the outcome, but it has nothing to do with identity politics except that the distaste for identity politics is what bred the movement that supports him.
